entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Halton Hills
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:29 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 5:11 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.0 km
Humidity: 100 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: E 23 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to rain or snow after midnight. Risk of freezing rain late this evening and after midnight. Local blowing snow this evening. Fog patches overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming east 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light before morning. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
